alert.note: Alert for Huron (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Lakeshore Flood Advisory issued October 17 at 10:03PM EDT until October 18 at 10:00AM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...LAKESHORE FLOOD ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM EDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...Minor lakeshore flooding expected. * WHERE...Huron County. * WHEN...Until 10 AM EDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS... Mainly shoreline and beach erosion due to onshore wind and waves but also high water possibly reaching low lying roads and property along the lakeshore. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... Strong north to northwest wind continues gusting around 40 mph tonight and Tuesday morning. A few higher gusts are possible south of Port Hope. The strong wind and high waves remain capable of shoreline erosion.
info.instruction: Residents on or near the shore should take appropriate action to protect property from rising water levels.
